meanings.definition: To make healthy or whole again.
meanings.sent1: The doctor healed the patient's wound with care.
meanings.sent2: She healed quickly after taking the medicine.
meanings.sent3: The magical bandage healed the injury in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her kind words healed his broken heart.
meanings.sent5: The healing touch of nature brought the flower back to life.

meanings.sent1: The craftsman healed the antique chair beautifully.
meanings.sent2: With time and effort, the old house was healed to its former glory.
meanings.sent3: The magical potion healed the cracked vase perfectly!
meanings.sent4: Her apology healed the rift between them.
meanings.sent5: The healing power of love repaired the broken relationship.

meanings.definition: To become healthy or whole again.
meanings.sent1: After resting, she healed from the flu.
meanings.sent2: The injured bird healed and flew away.
meanings.sent3: The magical soup healed her cold in no time!
meanings.sent4: Time healed the pain of the past.
meanings.sent5: The healing process of the body amazed the doctors.
